comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexandra_Fyodorovna_of_Hesse "Alix of Hesse and by Rhine, later Alexandra Feodorovna (Russian: Императрица Александра Фёдоровна Imperatritsa Aleksandra Fyodorovna) (6 June 1872 – 17 July 1918), was Empress consort of Russia as spouse of Nicholas II, the last Emperor of the Russian Empire." NYT of September 25, 1916 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10615FC345B17738... indicates that the Czarina (and her daughters, Grand Duchesses Tatiana Nicolaevna and Olga), "dressed in the simple costume of hospital nurses" accepted fifteen ambulances donated by a group of Americans.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the info on the Czarina and for explaining her clothing choice here. We will add the details and the context when updating the record.
